AUGMENTATION
Buy specific augment for *100 Festival Coin(s).*

Active : *Celestial Shield*
Become invincible momentarily.
Passive: *Clarity*
Decreases all skill MP consumption.
Chance: *Mana Burn*
Burns up the target's MP by a fixed rate
Passive: *Wild Magic*
Increases the critical rate of damage MAtk.
Passive: *Reflect Damage*
Reflect some damage back to the enemy.
Passive: *Focus*
Increases the critical rate of critical attacks.
Passive: *Agility*
Increases evasion when equipped.
Chance: *Duel Weakness*
Increases PVP P.Atk when you are under attack
Active: *Trick*
Cancels your enemy's target.
Active: *Vampiric Touch*
Absorbs HP from your target.
Active: *Heal*
Immediately recovers your HP. Power 552.
Active: *Stun*
Temporarily shock the target.
Active: *Might*
Increases P.Atk Temporarily.
Active: *Mana Burn*
Burns up the enemy's MP. Power 120.
Active: *Shield*
Increases P.Def temporarily.
Active: *Hurricane*
Wind Attack against nearby enemies.
Active: *Wild Magic*
Immediately recovers your HP. Power 552.
Chance: *Fear*
Fear on the target that under attack you.
